alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 10:41AM EST until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Alabama...Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17 feet, Considerable flooding of lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:05 AM CST Saturday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this afternoon to 18 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall to 17 feet and begin rising again Tuesday evening. It will rise to 17.3 feet Wednesday morning. It will then begin falling again. - Flood stage is 17 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
